Item Name: 2. Category: Spirit type (Vodka Gin Rum Whiskey Tequila Bourbon Liqueur Wine Beer)
5. Quantity on Hand: Current inventory count
9. Reorder Point: When to reorder (usually 1/3 of par level)
12. Notes: Additional info (expiration dates promotions special instructions)
13. Last Updated: Date of last inventory check
• Update this weekly or after major events
• Set par levels based on 2-3 weeks of typical usage
• Keep reorder points at about 1/3 of par level to avoid stockouts
• Use location codes for faster restocking
• Track slow-moving items in the Notes column
• Calculate total inventory value monthly for accounting
